text: Alfred Hugh Kingon (born May 11, 1931) is an American businessman who was the White House Cabinet Secretary under President Ronald Reagan from 1985 to 1987. He also was the United States Ambassador to the European Union from 1987 to 1989. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the European Union Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Alfred H. Kingon
